page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT AND INDUSTRY
page.content: Industries have existed in Chesterf'ld from a very early date,including{IRON {AND STEEL,POTTERY,COAL MINING,TEXTILE {MANUFACTURING.}The area is now known for {KENNINGS MOTORS,ROBINSONS(SURG'L) {TREBOR(SWEETS),BIRTLEY ENGINEERING, {J.J.BLOW (METAL FARMING PRODUCTS),EAST {MIDLANDS ELECT'Y,POSTAL FINANCE DEPT, {CHEST'LD PLANT HIRE,T.I.TUBE WORKS and {BRYAN DONKINS (ENGINEERING). A survey of the jobs in the area showed 142-repairs and services, 2435 manufacturing,53-sales,78-warehouses. Many people today are employed in the service industries than in traditional engineering.The miners' strike of1984/ 85 depressed or bankrupted many of the small businesses. Unemployment in the area is currently averaging three out of every ten of the working male and female adults. { }
